title: Personalized Learning Design Based on Interoperability of e-Learning Services

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational e-learning system knowledge, awareness of LOM (Learning Object Metadata) standards, and familiarity with SCORM/IMS basics
context.additional_context: For aspiring medical/legal/technical professionals, cultivating standardized learning object creation and interoperability problem-solving skills via VR simulations in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Personalized learning content packaging can be designed by applying learning object metadata standards (IEEE LOM, SCORM).
Establish and implement an API mapping strategy to resolve interoperability issues between heterogeneous repositories.
Evaluate the application of a dynamic learning path generation algorithm based on learner profiles in a VR simulation environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
